title: Anyone have a Blank Back for sale?
author: Jaybird

posts.post_title: Anyone have a Blank Back for sale?
posts.post_content:
Looking to buy one.  PM me.  I'll respond quickly with a strong offer.

Thanks,

Jason

Bump.  Anyone got one in their collection they were thinking about selling?  Drop me a line.  I'll make a strong offer.  T205s or T206s.

Thanks - J
bump for blank backs.  They're just taking up space.  I'll give them a good home  :)
r u going for the whole monster, Jason?
yes.  Of course.  They are so easy to find I figured I'd do one of each.  I'll trade 2 piedy's for each BB.  Today only ;)
Meh...should only take you a few years...but I'm guessing...the red background cobb will be a toughie!
Jason, try combing card shops. Every once in a while you'll come across one that combines arrogance with ignorance and doesn't realize what they've got.
if you could even find a card shop...that is!
You guys suck.  Just give me the cards.  I know you're both holding.

Bump.  Still looking.  T205s or T206s.

Thanks,

Jason

Jason,

Sorry for the delay in responding to your email.  While I do have several blank backs none of them are for sale at this time.

I hope that this bump at least helps you out a bit :)

Best,
Scott

I'm a hoarder too!!;)

ive still been looking....did u c the Goodwin??? nice card, i think someone got a steal.....not me tho:mad:

Scott, how ya been??how's pops???:D

To think id be chasing some rare backs after i told your dad i wasn't interested:)
